title: Improving Gemini Text-to-Speech models for better control and capabilities
summary: New Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro Text-to-Speech (TTS) preview models bring enhanced style and tone versatility, pacing control, and multi-speaker capabilities.
content: New Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro Text-to-Speech (TTS) preview models bring enhanced style and tone versatility, pacing control, and multi-speaker capabilities.
